basics.description: **Note:** Please refer to the following before installing the solution: • Review the solution [Release Notes](https://github.com/Azure/Azure-Sentinel/tree/master/Solutions/Netwrix%20Auditor/ReleaseNotes.md) • There may be [known issues](https://aka.ms/sentinelsolutionsknownissues) pertaining to this Solution, please refer to them before installing. The Netwrix Auditor solution provides the capability to ingest [ Netwrix Auditor](https://www.netwrix.com/auditor.html) (formerly Stealthbits Privileged Activity Manager) events into Microsoft Sentinel. Refer to Netwrix [documentation](https://helpcenter.netwrix.com/) for more information. 1. **Netwrix Auditor via AMA** - This data connector helps in ingesting Netwrix Auditor logs into your Log Analytics Workspace using the new Azure Monitor Agent. Learn more about ingesting using the new Azure Monitor Agent [here](https://learn.microsoft.com/azure/sentinel/connect-cef-ama). **Microsoft recommends using this Data Connector**. 2. **Netwrix Auditor via Legacy Agent** - This data connector helps in ingesting Netwrix Auditor logs into your Log Analytics Workspace using the legacy Log Analytics agent. **NOTE:** Microsoft recommends installation of Netwrix Auditor via AMA Connector. Legacy connector uses the Log Analytics agent which is about to be deprecated by **Aug 31, 2024,** and thus should only be installed where AMA is not supported. Using MMA and AMA on same machine can cause log duplication and extra ingestion cost [more details](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/sentinel/ama-migrate). **Data Connectors:** 2, **Parsers:** 1 [Learn more about Microsoft Sentinel](https://aka.ms/azuresentinel) | [Learn more about Solutions](https://aka.ms/azuresentinelsolutionsdoc)

options.text: This solution installs the data connector that allows to ingest CEF formatted Netwrix Auditor events into Microsoft Sentinel. After installing the solution, configure and enable this data connector by following guidance in Manage solution view.
The solution installs a parser that transforms ingested data. The transformed logs can be accessed using the NetwrixAuditor Kusto Function alias.
